جیک ڈورسی 2008 تک ٹویٹر کے سی ای او تھے: Was Jack Dorsey the CEO of Twitter until 2008? Jack Dorsey Twitter CEO 2008

Dorsey cofounded Twitter in 2006 with Ev Williams, Biz Stone and Noah Glass, and was CEO until 2008. He returned in 2015. In 2020, he promised to give away $1 billion (then 28% of his net worth) to Covid-19 relief and other causes.
Was Jack Dorsey the CEO of Twitter until 2008? Jack Dorsey Twitter CEO 2008

Dorsey lost his position as CEO in 2008, reportedly for leaving work early to enjoy other pursuits, such as yoga and fashion design. On October 16, 2008, Williams took over as CEO, while Dorsey became chairman of the board.
